Package ui.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DropItem
    DropItem is a key action that drops the selected item from the player's inventory
    InspectItem
    InspectItem is a key action that attempts to inspect the item in front of the player and displays some information about it if there is a valid item
    InteractWithItem
    InteractWithItem is a key action that interacts with the item in front of the player, launching a ContainerPopup if the item in front is a container, otherwise attempting to interact with it
    KeyAction
    The KeyAction is an abstract class for the actions bound to keys on the keyboard and lays out the required framework for responding to the key press
    MoveDown
    MoveDown is a key action that attempts to move the player in the SOUTH direction
    MoveLeft
    MoveLeft is a key action that attempts to move the player in the WEST direction
    MoveRight
    MoveRight is a key action that attempts to move the player in the EAST direction
    MoveUp
    MoveUp is a key action that attempts to move the player in the NORTH direction
    PickupItem
    PickupItem is a key action that attempts to pick up the item in front of the player
    RotateAntiClockwise
    RotateAntiClockwise is a key action that rotates the view in the anticlockwise direction
    RotateClockwise
    RotateClockwise is a key action that rotates the view in the clockwise direction
    SelectItem
    SelectItem is a key action that selects the inventory slot corresponding to the number pressed
    ThrowSnowball
    ThrowSnowball is a key action that prompts the throwing of a snowball by the player
    UseItem
    UseItem is a key action that uses the currently selected item in the players inventory.
